{{- $ctx := . -}} {{- $imageResource := .imageResource -}} {{- $getRelative := .getRelative -}} {{- $imageLink := "" -}} {{- if $imageResource -}} {{- if not $getRelative -}} {{- $imageLink = $imageResource.Permalink -}} {{- else -}} {{- $imageLink = $imageResource.RelPermalink -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}} {{- return $imageLink -}}
